data.title: Friends of Distinction
data.text:
Become a Friend of Distinction

The ministry of San Pedro Spiritual Development Center is supported by the prayers and financial donations of generous individuals and families throughout the country like you. Our entire staff embraces the special responsibility we are charged with to care for these holy grounds and those we serve who visit San Pedro Center each day. We are passionate about our mission to nourish the spiritual life of persons seeking to deepen their relationship with God through prayer, reflection, education and the pursuit of Gospel values.

Our new Friends of Distinction Giving Program offers three levels and a monthly or annual donation cycle.

Saint Clare of Assisi Level

Donation of $2500.00 - $4999.00 annually

“Steadfast in faith, forward in hope” was the motto of St. Clare of Assisi. She was quoted as saying, “We are to become vessels of God’s compassionate love for others.” She left her life of worldly wealth to live a life devoted to Jesus Christ as a poor nun, to live simply, growing in holiness and praying for a world in need of God. Our property offers over 200 acres of natural beauty on the shores of Lake Howell for visitors to spend time in simple prayer as St. Clare demonstrated.

Benefits of Saint Clare of Assisi Level:

Remembered in our daily Masses celebrated in the Mary, Mother of God Chapel

Advance invitation to our annual Friends of San Pedro Gala

Annual Christmas Gift

St. Clare of Assisi Prayer Card

Two-night stay in one of our cabins with a welcome bottle of wine. (Subject to availability and block-out dates.)

Bishop Thomas J. Grady Level

Donation of $1000 - $2499 annually

The bishop who founded San Pedro Spiritual Development Center on 480 acres of lush forest and protected wetlands situated on the shores of Lake Howell. As bishop of our diocese from 1974-1990, he served with compassion and dedication during these years of extraordinary growth. Under Bishop Grady’s direction the beautiful Mary, Mother of God Chapel was completed and serves as the center for Eucharistic celebrations daily.

Benefits of Bishop Thomas J. Grady Level:

Remembered in our daily Masses celebrated in the Mary, Mother of God Chapel

Advance invitation to our annual Friends of San Pedro Gala

Annual Christmas Gift

San Pedro Prayer Card
